response.overview: When an explosion at an oil well threatens hundreds of lives, a crack team is called upon to make a deadly desert crossing with nitroglycerine in tow.
response.title: The Wages of Fear

titles.title: Cái Giá Của Sự Sợ Hãi

cast.name: Brice Bexter
cast.character: Copilote de l'hélicoptère (as Brice El Glaoui Bexter)
